properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Watch issued January 6 at 2:36AM PST until January 8 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south to southwest winds
15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 8 to 13 feet at 12
seconds. For the Hazardous Seas Watch, very steep and hazardous
seas 9 to 11 feet at 7 to 8 seconds possible.

* WHERE...The Hazardous Seas Watch is for areas from Sisters Rocks
north. The Small Craft Advisory is for all areas except when and
where the Watch is in effect.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM PST Thursday.
For the Hazardous Seas Watch, from late tonight through late
Tuesday night.

* IMPACTS...Steep to very steep and hazardous seas could capsize
or damage vessels. Bar crossing could become especially
hazardous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Consider altering your plans to avoid possible hazardous and very
steep sea conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT
